entry.value: library(dplyr)%%00010library(ggplot2)%%00010library(tidyr)%%00010library(ggrepel)%%00010%%00010df_sum <- knime.in%%00010unique(df_sum$category)%%00010%%00010df_sum$category <- factor(as.character(df_sum$category), levels = c('histone', 'ribosomal', 'crap', 'other'))%%00010%%00009%%00010df_sum <- df_sum |>%%00010%%00009select(-quant) |>%%00010%%00009arrange(category) |>%%00010%%00009group_by(sample) |>%%00010%%00009arrange(sample) |>%%00010%%00009na.omit() |>%%00010%%00009mutate(csum = rev(cumsum(rev(perc))), %%00010 pos = csum - perc + perc/2,%%00010 pos = pos)%%00010%%00010p <- ggplot(df_sum, aes(x = '', y = perc, fill = category)) +%%00010%%00009geom_col(width = 1, color = 'white') +%%00010%%00009geom_label_repel(aes(y = pos, label = paste(round(perc, 2), '%')),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 show.legend = FALSE,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 nudge_x = 1) +%%00010%%00009coord_polar('y', start = 0) +%%00010%%00009scale_fill_manual(values = c('histone' = 'darkcyan',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 'ribosomal' = 'maroon',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 %%00009 'crap' = 'firebrick3',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 %%00009 'other' = 'snow3')) +%%00010%%00009theme_void() +%%00010%%00009theme(legend.position = 'bottom',%%00010%%00009%%00009 legend.title = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009 %%00009 strip.text = element_text(size = 12),%%00010%%00009%%00009 panel.background = element_rect(color = 'grey20', fill = NA))%%00010%%00010if (knime.flow.in[["size"]] == 'Auto') {%%00010%%00009p <- p + facet_wrap(. ~ sample, nrow = knime.flow.in[["nrow"]], ncol = knime.flow.in[["ncol"]])%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009p <- p + facet_wrap(. ~ sample)%%00010}%%00010%%00010p

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
